articles.title: Brent oil price passes $70 on OPEC projections of a tightening crude market - WorldOil
articles.description: A robust recovery in the U.S. and Europe has given OPEC+ the confidence that markets can absorb additional barrels, despite the prospect of more supply from Iran should a nuclear deal be revived, and a Covid-19 comeback in Asia, most notably India.
articles.content:
Brent oil price passes $70 on OPEC projections of a tightening crude market
(Bloomberg) --Brent oil advanced above $70 a barrel after the OPEC+ alliance forecast a tightening global market ahead of … [+3270 chars]
